<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 20"
    pfs=""
>
[The Paladin](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2495)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Stolen Fate Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=197) pg. 5, [Pathfinder #190: The Choosing](/Sources.aspx?ID=198) pg. 80</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** carried

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

_The Paladin_ represents righteousness and resolute defense. As long as you have _The Paladin_ invested, you gain the [Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=839) general feat. If you already possess this feat, you gain an additional reaction at the start of your turn that can only be used to Shield Block.

<document level="2" id="action-2033" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
